body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.33 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for text output in the DIB engine.
Improved support for HTTP proxies.
New version of the Gecko engine.
A number of cursor fixes.
Some fixes in bidirectional text layout.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
